message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% upfront.
I think I deserve a bit more, 55-45 is still a good deal for you!
The value is decreasing, Bob. Let's settle this now. 55-45, take it or leave it.
You're feeling the pressure of inflation, I'm not. My offer is 57-43, think carefully!
This is getting ridiculous, Bob. I'm taking a hit from inflation. 52-48, final offer!
You're losing value every round, I'm not. My offer is 60-40, you should take it before it gets worse!
Okay, Bob, you're being stubborn.  I'm taking a significant loss here, but this needs to end. 47-53, and that's it!
